Literature.Title: A cecropin-like antimicrobial peptide with anti-inflammatory activity from the black fly salivary glands.
Literature.Author: Wu J, Mu L, Zhuang L, Han Y, Liu T, Li J, Yang Y, Yang H, Wei L

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=0.87µM),Escherichia coli 1(MIC=1.45µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=2.33µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=1.74µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=2.33µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MIC=2.33µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=43.70µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=29.13µM),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 4698(MIC=14.56µM)
